questions.question: Inputs CARDDAT describes VSAM key as WS-CARD-RID (CARDNUM + ACCT-ID), but STARTBR/READNEXT use RIDFLD(WS-CARD-RID-CARDNUM) KEYLENGTH(LENGTH OF WS-CARD-RID-CARDNUM)=16 only (lines 1129-1132, 1146, 1197). Is the key CARDNUM only, or composite? ACCT-ID filtering is post-read only (lines 1385-1386).

Purpose and business_rules omit admin vs non-admin logic from comments (lines 4-6: all cards if admin/no context, else filter by COMMAREA ACCT-ID). No explicit code found (CSUSR01Y line 285, CDEMO-USRTYP-USER line 320 set always). Is there user-type filtering, or comments outdated?

Business rules BR001/BR002 claim 'exactly 11-digit/16-digit numeric', but code checks only IS NOT NUMERIC (lines 1017, 1052), no length validation (assumes map PIC lengths?). CC-ACCT-ID-N/CC-CARD-NUM-N redefines not used for validation.
Copybooks_used misses COTTL01Y(272 titles), CSMSG01Y(281 messages), CSUSR01Y(285 user data potentially for admin). Relevant for purpose/business_rules (titles, msgs, user-type)?
Business rules BR003 says 'Exactly one row select allowed', but code permits zero selects (tally I>1 only errors, else redisplays lines 1084, 1102). Is zero allowed (no action), or must exactly one?

Inputs CARDDAT describes VSAM key as 'WS-CARD-RID (CARDNUM + ACCT-ID)', but STARTBR/READNEXT/READPREV use RIDFLD(WS-CARD-RID-CARDNUM) with KEYLENGTH(LENGTH OF WS-CARD-RID-CARDNUM)=16 only (lines 1129-1132, 1146-1151, 1197-1202, 1294-1299, 1300, 1322-1327); ACCT-ID filtered post-read (1385-1391). Is key CARDNUM-only?

Business rules BR001/BR002 claim 'exactly 11/16-digit numeric' with 'length via redefines', but code only checks IS NOT NUMERIC (lines 1017, 1052), no explicit length check (relies on map?). Redefines CC-ACCT-ID-N/CARD-NUM-N unused for validation.

Business rules BR003 'Exactly one row select allowed (S/U)', but code errors only if tally >1 (line 1084) or invalid (1109), allows zero selects (no error, redisplays list line 578/419). Is zero selects valid (no action/XCTL)?

Purpose/business_rules miss admin logic from comments lines 4-6 ('all cards if admin/no context, else ACCT COMMAREA filter'), but code always SET CDEMO-USRTYP-USER (320), no check (CSUSR01Y 285 loaded but unused?). Outdated comments or missing impl?
Copybooks_used omits COTTL01Y(272 titles to screen), CSMSG01Y(281 messages), CSUSR01Y(285 user data). Relevant for screen init (647-648), msgs (924), potential admin?
